complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement User Management and Role-Based Access Control
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the user management and role-based access control implementation into focused subtasks covering JWT authentication setup, user registration/login endpoints, role-based middleware, profile management, session handling, and admin interface development. Each subtask should be independently testable and deliverable.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity due to security requirements, multiple authentication mechanisms, role-based permissions, and admin functionality. Critical foundation task requiring careful implementation of security best practices.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Order Creation and Management System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose the order management system into subtasks for REST API development, dual order creation logic, Gutachter selection interface, status tracking implementation, and order listing/filtering functionality. Focus on the core business logic and API design patterns.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity involving core business logic, dual order creation, API design, and user interface components. Central to the application's primary functionality.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Document Management and Merging System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split document management into subtasks for file upload handling, document merging service implementation, storage solution setup, and document access control. Address different file formats and security considerations separately.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity with file handling, format conversion, storage management, and security concerns. Requires integration with external libraries and storage solutions.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down notification system into subtasks for email service setup, automated notification triggers, in-app messaging implementation, and real-time notification delivery. Consider different notification channels and delivery mechanisms.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity involving multiple communication channels, real-time features, and integration with external email services. Requires careful handling of notification preferences and delivery tracking.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Deadline Management and Reminder System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose deadline management into subtasks for deadline calculation service, automated reminder scheduling, Mahnwesen escalation system, calendar integration, and dashboard visualization. Focus on time-based processing and automation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity due to time-based automation, escalation logic, calendar integration, and scheduled job management. Critical for business process compliance.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Gutachten Submission and Digital Signature System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the submission system into subtasks for submission interface development, digital signature integration, validation and completeness checks, version control implementation, and compliance verification. Address legal and technical requirements separately.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity involving digital signatures, legal compliance, file validation, and version control. Requires integration with external signature services and adherence to regulatory standards.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Order Cancellation and Visibility Management
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split cancellation management into subtasks for cancellation workflow implementation, visibility timer and soft delete functionality, and automated cleanup service. Focus on data lifecycle management and scheduled operations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity with straightforward business logic but requiring careful handling of data lifecycle, soft deletes, and scheduled cleanup processes.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Billing and Invoice Management System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose billing system into subtasks for invoice submission interface, approval workflow implementation, PDF generation service, and reporting dashboard. Address financial data handling and integration requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity involving financial data, approval workflows, PDF generation, and potential accounting system integration. Requires careful validation and audit trail implementation.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the statement request system into subtasks for request interface and workflow, notification and response handling, and integration with main Gutachten process. Focus on request-response tracking and workflow integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity with straightforward request-response workflow but requiring integration with existing notification system and main business process.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Comprehensive Audit Trail and Logging System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split audit system into subtasks for logging framework setup, audit trail data model, administrative interface development, and compliance reporting. Address different logging levels and retention requirements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Medium complexity requiring systematic approach to logging, data retention, search capabilities, and compliance reporting. Important for regulatory compliance and system monitoring.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Automated Data Retention and Cleanup System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Decompose data retention into subtasks for retention policy engine, automated cleanup service, secure deletion implementation, and GDPR compliance verification. Focus on data lifecycle automation and regulatory compliance.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate-high complexity due to GDPR compliance requirements, secure data deletion, automated scheduling, and policy management. Critical for legal compliance and data governance.
